full_text: This Electronic Message contains information from and may be privileged. The information is intended for the use of the addressee only. If you are not the addressee, please note that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or use of the contents of this message is prohibited. From: [redacted] @bop.gov Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 1:57 PM To: [redacted] @usdoj.gov; [redacted] @usdoj.gov; [redacted] @usdoj.gov; [redacted] @usdoj.gov Subject: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein Good afternoon, Enclosed please find official notification from Warden N'Diaye regarding Mr. Epstein's passing. As the investigation is ongoing, we have no further details at this time. We will continue to keep you updated as more information is available. Thank you, [redacted] Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-[redacted] f: (646)836-7665 Page 1660 DOJ-OGR-00023634

text_blocks.content: This Electronic Message contains information from and may be privileged. The information is intended for the use of the addressee only. If you are not the addressee, please note that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or use of the contents of this message is prohibited.

From: [redacted] @bop.gov Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 1:57 PM To: [redacted] @usdoj.gov; [redacted] @usdoj.gov; [redacted] @usdoj.gov; [redacted] @usdoj.gov Subject: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein

Good afternoon, Enclosed please find official notification from Warden N'Diaye regarding Mr. Epstein's passing. As the investigation is ongoing, we have no further details at this time. We will continue to keep you updated as more information is available.
Thank you, [redacted] Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-[redacted] f: (646)836-7665

additional_notes: The document contains redactions, likely due to privacy or security concerns.
